## Summary
Gursimran Singh is a Technical Program Manager at Google DeepMind in San Francisco.
Previously a Product Manager at Microsoft Azure (Observability and AIOps).
Georgia Tech graduate (Computer Science + Design).

## Preferred Name and Attribution

## Short Bio
Gursimran Singh works at the intersection of technical program leadership, product thinking, and design.
He has experience across AI-adjacent technical programs, cloud product development, and startup execution.
